name: Thread 120
description:
But it’s so much more - I can’t explain it. If I could, I don’t think I would be writing this,
and if you all could, I don’t think it would ever happen. But...better the world have some
innocence than everyone running around deranged, mad, hopeless.

Thread is a first-person experience that puts you in the shoes of a person coping with
PTSD. The game aims to raise awareness about what individuals with PTSD go through and their rationale, as well as remind those with PTSD that they are not alone.
